original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, process expertise, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business requirements, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, think strategically, and implement practical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and develop effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Expertise in configuring and maintaining complex systems, with a solid understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing principles

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively work with the underlying technical components of the system
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their application in streamlining business processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business acumen with technical proficiency, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in an iterative, customer-centric development environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context and industry-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, software, and technologies relevant to the role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating strong time management and organizational skills
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and technological advancements

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, process expertise, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business requirements, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights. Your ability to think strategically, collaborate cross-functionally, and implement practical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and providing comprehensive feedback
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to ensure institutional knowledge and enable effective ongoing support
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems, identify root causes, and develop effective, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences and build consensus across diverse teams
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Expertise in configuring and maintaining complex systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing principles

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively work with the underlying technical components of the system
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their application in streamlining business processes and improving system efficiency

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that blends business acumen with technical proficiency, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in an iterative, customer-centric development environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context and industry-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, software, and technologies relevant to the role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating excellent time management, organizational, and prioritization skills
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and technological advancements, with a proactive and solutions-oriented mindset

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, process expertise, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business requirements, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights. Your ability to think strategically, collaborate cross-functionally, and implement practical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the business, ultimately contributing to the organization's overall success.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, utilizing industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows) to document them clearly and concisely
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights that inform strategic decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices, collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvement
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and providing comprehensive feedback to ensure optimal system performance
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to ensure institutional knowledge and enable effective ongoing support
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations, acting as a trusted technical advisor and strategic partner

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems, identify root causes, and develop effective, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences and build consensus across diverse teams
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Expertise in configuring and maintaining complex systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing principles

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively work with the underlying technical components of the system
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their application in streamlining business processes and improving system efficiency

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a role that blends business acumen with technical proficiency, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in an iterative, customer-centric development environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, which would provide valuable context and industry-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, software, and technologies relevant to the role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement, innovation, and strategic alignment
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating excellent time management, organizational, and prioritization skills
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and technological advancements, with a proactive, solutions-oriented, and strategic mindset
